entries.name: hkdf(ikm, salt:, info:, length:, hash:) → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: HMAC-based Extract-and-Expand Key Derivation Function (HKDF) as specified in RFC 5869.

entries.name: pbkdf2_hmac(pass, salt:, iterations:, length:, hash:) → aStringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: PKCS #5 PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2) in combination with HMAC. Takes pass, salt and iterations, and then derives a key of length bytes.

entries.name: scrypt(pass, salt:, N:, r:, p:, length:) → aStringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Derives a key from pass using given parameters with the scrypt password-based key derivation function. The result can be used for password storage.
